tldr: Affected versions of the package are vulnerable to storage of sensitive information in a cookie. The API access token is stored in the cookie under the name `kinde_api_access_token`, potentially exposing it to unauthorized access.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@kinde-oss/kinde-auth-nextjs` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Storage of Sensitive Information in a Cookie
